title: Textile, mid-19th century
medium: Glass and gilt beads, silk and wool on canvas.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Pattern of repeated motif of curving flowers arranged to face alternately left and right.  Colors: several shades of blue, pink, green, brown, and gray.  Worked in beading, and tent and outline stitches.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Glass and gilt beads, silk and wool on canvas.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-27.
